Articles.Content:
Hello!

Before anyone says im on the wrong forum, i dont know where to find art requests

I would like if someone could make a kerbal in space art with the tag ImFrozen somewhere on the screen

Sincerely, ImFrozen AKA Tobbzzzz

I'm sure it sounds like a simple request but... trust me... graphic designers of all kinds hate to work with vague descriptions unless they're being paid for their time instead of for the final product. If you're asking stuff for free, I really recommend you be as specific as humanly possible so they don't make something they really think turns out well but simply doesn't really suit you. It can be really frustrating, particularly in graphic design and web design (see here for extensive examples of what I mean), for clients to be very general about what they want. xD

I'm sure someone will love to help you out... but just try to make it as easy for them as you can, otherwise everyone ends up frustrated nine times out of ten

<a href="http://imgur.com/wPucpXd"><img src="http://i.imgur.com/wPucpXd.png" title="Hosted by imgur.com"/></a>

Couldn't help myself, sorry.
Now, now, let's not start trouble xD

Now, now, let's not start trouble xD

Hey, he got what he asked for xD
Like I said, OP. Specific. Mkay?

Well

I will close this thread now because my mate's up for it
Or, if a Mod could close this for me, i would be happy
